item.title: Items that turn u into npcs
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

this requires a client. what you do is, in your client… open Class8.JAVA… add a new item using say… 3rd age legs id

if(i == #####) //itemid { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = #####; //inventory/drop model id class8.anInt181 = 1740; //inv/drop zoom class8.anInt190 = 572; //inv/drop zoom class8.anInt198 = 0; //inv/drop zoom class8.anInt169 = 4; //inv/drop zoom class8.anInt194 = 11; //inv/drop zoom class8.anInt165 = #####; //equiped model class8.anInt200 = #####; //equiped model(female) class8.anInt164 = -1; //inv/drop zoom class8.anInt188 = -1; //inv/drop zoom class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "ITEMNAME"; class8.aByteArray178 = "ITEMDESCRIPTION".getBytes(); }

make the inv model ID the ID into say, 3rd age plate inv model. Change the equiped model the the model of the NPC… most NPCs have more than 1 model so i suggest making 1 item per section, say… helm for head, plate for arms, legs for legs.

Read full topic
